title: Client continuously crashes in game.
body: My client does not stay connected during games. I experience frequent crashes and disconnects despite a strong reliable WiFi connection throughout. This has led to -30LP today!!! Please help me. What is going on?!

replies.body: Your own wifi might be okay, but it sounds like it's having a hard time keeping a stable connection with our game servers for some reason. Most of the time this is due to some internet settings being a little off. Let's run through the steps in our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to be sure we cover all of our bases.

Perhaps you should post your computer's specs or any error messages so people can help. I'd imagine it's probably an issue with your graphics card (or lack thereof?), not meeting the system requirements, or there're some missing files.
